thread.title: Harding picked to win Great American Conference basketball
thread.title_full: Harding picked to win Great American Conference basketball

title: Harding picked to win Great American Conference basketball
text:
CONNECT 1 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE RUSSELLVILLE, Ark. (AP) â€” Harding University is the choice to win the Great American Conference basketball championship.
Harding received four first place votes in the poll and is followed by East Central Oklahoma, Ouachita Baptist and Arkansas Tech in the voting conference coaches that was released Wednesday.
East Central received three first place votes; Ouachita Baptist received four and Arkansas Tech received one.
Southwestern Oklahoma State, Southern Nazarene, Southern Arkansas, Southeastern Oklahoma State, Arkansas-Monticello, Henderson State, Northwestern Oklahoma State and Oklahoma Baptist round out the poll.
